description: Wraps the Node.js fs library with a Promise API using whichever `Promise` implementation is available
name: fs-then-native

scripts.cover: istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/test-runner src/test/*.js && cat coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/.bin/coveralls && rm -rf coverage; echo
scripts.es5: rm -rf es5 && babel --presets babel-preset-es2015 --no-comments src --out-dir es5
